mapper.insert: insert into stock(stockno,stockcnt,stockname,stockprice,categrpno,manager) values( (select nvl(max(stockno),0) + 1 as stockno from stock), #{stockCnt}, #{stockName}, #{stockPrice}, #{categrpNo}, #{manager} )
mapper.select: select s.stockno, s.stockcnt, s.stockname, s.stockprice, s.manager, s.stockrdate, c.categrpname as categrpname from stock s inner join categroup c on s.categrpno = c.categrpno order by s.stockrdate desc

select s.stockno, s.stockcnt, s.stockname, s.stockprice, s.manager, s.stockrdate, c.categrpname as categrpname from stock s inner join categroup c on s.categrpno = c.categrpno where s.stockno = #{stockNo}
mapper.update: update stock set stockname = #{stockName} , stockprice = #{stockPrice} , stockcnt = #{stockCnt} , categrpno = #{categrpNo} where stockno = #{stockNo}
